title: 92/337/EEC: Council Decision of 16 June 1992 amending for the third time Decision 90/424/EEC on expenditure in the veterinary field
header:
COUNCIL DECISION
of 16 June  1992
amending for the third time Decision 90/424/EEC on expenditure in the veterinary field
(92/337/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The following indent shall be added to  Group 1 of the Annex to Decision 90/424/EEC:
'-  African swine fever`.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 16 June 1992. For the Council
The President
Arlindo MARQUES CUNHA
